FuncDef: This command configures ATM Virtual Circuit ranges and is supported only in max16k-vc ATM MDA mode. An ATM MDA supports a number of passive (or listening) VCs, of which a subset can be simultaneously active.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the VC range. Values-1 to 5 (Five ranges are supported to accommodate non-contiguous ranges of VPI/VCI pairs..
Specifies the VCI range. Values-1, 2, 5 to 65535 (Contiguous VCI ranges in the form of x-y.).
Specifies the VPI range. Values-0 to 255 for UNI.
